Neumitra - stress management devices, apps, and analytics - Boston, MA at South Station/Leather District

Full-time for embedded, mobile, and full stack applications from physiological and contextual data.

We're hiring data-driven engineers including embedded firmware, mobile, and web applications, back-end and front-end technologies. Our stack runs from the body to servers. We use machine learning and statistical learning techniques to build personalized and population health technologies for stress management.

We're also hiring mechanical and research engineers who love to iterate on technologies based on user interactions and feedback. We appreciate experiences and enthusiasm for building unique tools that have a meaningful impact. Our mission is to solve global questions of stress, health, performance, and happiness. We've had great luck finding amazing people here.

Please say hello@neumitra.com!
